awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 2 nominations.

fullplot: Threatened in turn by a fox, an owl and a snake, a little mouse scares them all off by claiming he is waiting for his monstrous friend the Gruffalo. He believes the Gruffalo does not exist but it does and it too wants to eat him. However, the mouse survives by tricking the Gruffalo into believing who is the most scary creature in the wood.
plot: A cunning mouse goes for a walk in the forest and outwits a succession of predators.
title: The Gruffalo
